data.title: Brightview Woodburn Assisted Living
data.meta_description: Brightview Woodburn, Brightview’s third senior living community in Virginia, is under construction at 3450 Gallows Road.  Featuring dedicated Assisted Living apartments and Brightview’s specialized program and environment for Alzheimer's Care known as Wellspring Village®, Brightview Woodburn is scheduled to open spring, 2016. Please call for more information or visit the website.
data.text:
Brightview Woodburn, Brightview’s third senior living community in Virginia, opened at 3450 Gallows Road in 2016. Brightview Woodburn offers an Assisted Living Community with housing for 104 senior citizens. Personalized health care management by on-site licensed nurses, personal assistance with bathing, dressing, or grooming; assistance with prescribed medication, and 24-hour supervision by specially trained staff are part of the services. It also provides regular health and wellness assessments, daily resident safety checks, daily activities, and entertainment programs, scheduled transportation for shopping, personal appointments, and community events.

Brightview Woodburn also offers its specialized program and environment for Alzheimer's Care known as Wellspring Village®. Please call for more information or visit the website.
